subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Marcel Kittel of Germany won the seventh stage of the Spanish Vuelta on Friday, while Sylvain Chavanel of France held the overall leader’s jersey for the fourth consecutive day.
snippet: Marcel Kittel of Germany won the seventh stage of the Spanish Vuelta on Friday, while Sylvain Chavanel of France held the overall leader’s jersey for the fourth consecutive day.
